Class PasswordManager

java.lang.Object
PasswordManager
public class PasswordManager extends Object
PasswordManager - a simple password management application with a console interface. The application provides functions for adding, viewing, editing, and deleting password entries. Passwords are encrypted and stored in a file using the AES encryption algorithm with a randomly generated salt.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      Secret key.
      Throws:
